attributes.action: introduce a "No Claims" system for minor speeding offences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We consider it unfair that a person who has had a clean driving record for many years should be penalised for a moment's inattention and prosecuted as though they were careless drivers.

We ask the government to introduce a system similar to that used by insurance companies for "No Claims". A driver who has had no driving offences for a period of 10 years would be entitled to one minor (note: MINOR) speeding offence which would incur only a warning.

Additional periods of 10 years safe driving would accumulate additional "bonuses".

We believe that this would be a popular decision and would also help to alleviate the perception that speed cameras are being used as a means of generating revenue.
